title: Kojima Hints at Horror Game - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.25.2019
description:
Imran and Fran talk potential Kojima horror, Cyberpunk next-gen, and the state of Stadia 4K.

Time Stamps - 
00:01:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, Zack Parsley, Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:11 - Hideo Kojima Is Hinting At A Return To Horror (Gamespot via James O’Connor)
00:18:30 - Microsoft in 'Early Talks' for Project xCloud Exclusives (IGN by Andrew Smith)
00:28:48 - Google responds to criticisms of Stadia's 4K support (GI.biz by Brendan Sinclair)
00:43:40 -Cyberpunk 2077 Will Probably Come to PS5 and Scarlett, But Not at Launch (IGN by Chris Priestman)
00:52:3 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:55:22 - Do you both have any memories on playing games on sick days at home? - Frankfurtter
00:57:40 - As former employees of the media/journalism party of the game industry, do you ever experience crunch? - BJ Bernardo
01:: - I noticed on the playstation now store banner some small print which states GOW UC4 and GTAV are only available until January 2020. Doesn't seem like much of a window for games as a service. Any thoughts on this? - Hermanator
01:04:25 - Squad up with your fam!
01:04:32 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Imran and Whitta
Gamescast: Imran, Fran, Andy; Call-In show for Patreon
